name: Escape Tales: I
description:
Escape Tales is about escaping from the mad people in the woods. To be able to escape, you have to scather for 10 keys around the map. When you got all the keys you can escape through the labyrinth. 3 Enemies lurking in the woods. Flashlight and NighVision is in the game. Feel free to comment :)
